alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calhoun and central Orangeburg Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookdale, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Cameron, Rowesville, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 136 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
